name: Learner's Hub
features: Private Route option - If someone is not logged in, he can't view certain page.
Firebase authentication for registering
Firebase authentication for login with github as social login
Firebase authentication for login with google as social login
Mobile device responsive

name: Turjo's Photography
features: Private Route option - If someone is not logged in, he can't view certain page.
Firebase authentication for registering
Firebase authentication for login with google
Mobile device responsive
Have a server made of Express js
Have a database which is mongodb
Have CRUD functionalities
User can add review for a service if he's logged in only
User can see his reviews only
User can see others review about a package

name: Vehicles Zone
details: A second hand vehicle selling website
features: Firebase authentication for registering an user
Firebase authentication for login with google
Mobile device responsive
Have a server made of Express js
Have a database which is mongodb
Have CRUD functionalities
Have seperate route for admin, buyer and seller
Have authentication functions
Have payment method
Admin can see all buyers and selllers and can delete any one of them
Admin can verify a seller if he wants
Seller can see all his products and advertise the product if wants
Buyer can book and pay for the product also can see his bookings
